definition: to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn
(literary) to die by hanging or strangulation
to cut the corpse of a criminal into pieces
squeezing the fingers between sticks (old form of torture)
to be forced to grind grain as a punishment (old)
palm fiber/rope of palm fiber/coir (coconut fiber)
corporal punishment (such as castration or amputation)
rootstock (stem onto which a branch is grafted)
to tear off a person's four limbs and head using five horse drawn carts (as capital punishment)/to tear limb from limb
to squeeze the fingers (old form of torture)
new shoot growing from cut branch or stump
corporal punishment consisting of carving and inking characters on the victim's forehead
